plot: Masaki is a rebellious former basketball star who was expelled from previous school and Kanako who has heart condition and 2 years older than her classmates falling in love. Has plenty of drama through his basketball, Kanako's health, Masaki's relationship with his father and more. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Sotsugyō Shashin" (卒業写真) by Nao Nakadai
ending_theme: "Te no Naka no Seiza" (手の中の星座) by Nao Nakadai
